name: search_code
description: Search for code patterns or text across the codebase

pattern.description: The search pattern or text to find

path.description: Directory or file path to search within (optional)

name: read_file
description: Read the contents of a file

path.description: Path to the file to read

name: run_tests
description: Run test suites or specific test files

path.description: Path to test file or directory (optional, runs all if omitted)

name: create_file
description: Create a new file with the given content

content.description: Content to write to the file

name: edit_file
description: Edit an existing file by replacing text or inserting at a line number

path.description: Path to the file to edit

name: git_status
description: Show the current git status including changed, staged, and untracked files

name: list_files
description: List files and directories at a given path

name: explain_code
description: Explain what a piece of code or file does

path.description: Path to the file to explain
